MOV R8, 0
MOV R1, 0x410000
MOV R2, 100
SYSCALL
MOV R8, 3
MOV R1, 0x410000
MOV R2, 0x420000
MOV R3, 100
SYSCALL
MOV R2, R8
MOV R8, 1
MOV R1, 0x420000
SYSCALL
MOV R8, 2
MOV R1, 0
SYSCALL

b'flag.txt'.hex() = '666c61672e747874'

MOV R8, 0
MOV R1, 0x410000
MOV R2, 100
MOV R5, 0x400086
MOV [R5+0x00], 0x20564f4d
MOV [R5+0x04], 0x202c3852
MOV [R5+0x08], 0x00000031

0040001 2c203078 34313030 , 0x4100
0040001 30300a4d 4f562052 00.MOV R
0040002 322c2031 30300a53 2, 100.S
0040002 59534341 4c4c0a4d YSCALL.M
0040003 4f562052 382c2033 OV R8, 3
0040003 0a4d4f56 2052312c .MOV R1,
0040004 20307834 31303030  0x41000
0040004 300a4d4f 56205232 0.MOV R2
0040005 2c203078 34323030 , 0x4200
0040005 30300a4d 4f562052 00.MOV R

0040006 59534341 4c4c0a4d YSCALL.M
